alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 17 at 4:21AM CDT until October 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 065, 066, 067, 068, and 069. Fire weather zones 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, 012, 013, 014, 108, 112, and 114. * WIND...Northwest around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...18 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
